themes: impact of small grants on emerging artists
access to resources for music and art creation
community access to new art and music
key_phrases: a small amount $500-$1,000 can really help an emerging artist
catalyst for recording and releasing a song or purchasing necessary equipment or merch to resale
lower amounts could also be spent faster within the local Austin economy
give the entire community access to more new music and art that otherwise would not created and/or distributed
barriers_identified: lack of small-scale funding for emerging artists
limited access to resources for creating and distributing art
solutions_proposed: provide small grants ($500-$1,000) to emerging artists
